Greeley.KFKA: KFKA (1310 AM) is a radio station licensed to Greeley, Colorado that serves the Fort Collins-Greeley area. KFKA began broadcasts in June, 1923 as KFKA on 1100 kHz making it the second Colorado radio station after KLZ. It is the flagship station for the University of Northern Colorado Bears football and basketball radio network. It also carries a full slate of high school football and basketball games.
